com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.android.library.audio

Interface AudioConsumer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MicrophoneInputStream

    public interface AudioConsumer
    Delegate for consuming audio data from MicrophoneCaptureThread.

      Consume.
